18#include <string>
19#include <memory>
20
21namespace ZXing {
22
23class BitMatrix;
24enum class CharacterSet;
25
26namespace Pdf417 {
27
28enum class Compaction;
29class Encoder;
30
31/**
32* @author Jacob Haynes
33* @author qwandor@google.com (Andrew Walbran)
34*/
35class Writer
36{
37public:
38 Writer();
39 Writer(Writer &&);
40 ~Writer();
41
42 Writer& setMargin(int margin) { _margin = margin; return *this; }
43
44 Writer& setErrorCorrectionLevel(int ecLevel) { _ecLevel = ecLevel; return *this; }
45
46 /**
47 * Sets max/min row/col values
48 *
49 * @param maxCols maximum allowed columns
50 * @param minCols minimum allowed columns
51 * @param maxRows maximum allowed rows
52 * @param minRows minimum allowed rows
53 */
54 Writer& setDimensions(int minCols, int maxCols, int minRows, int maxRows);
55
56 /**
57 * @param compaction compaction mode to use
58 */
59 Writer& setCompaction(Compaction compaction);
60
61 /**
62 * @param compact if true, enables compaction
63 */
64 Writer& setCompact(bool compact);
65
66 /**
67 * @param encoding sets character encoding to use
68 */
69 Writer& setEncoding(CharacterSet encoding);
70
71
72 BitMatrix encode(const std::wstring& contents, int width, int height) const;
73
74private:
75 int _margin = -1;
76 int _ecLevel = -1;
77 std::unique_ptr<Encoder> _encoder;
78};
79
80} // Pdf417
81} // ZXing
82
